Product details of Trio TFS18 Food Steamer 2 Tier 10L
Double heater
Instead of wasting your time in the kitchen, you can now spend more time indulging your cooked meal rather than cooking! With 1800W, you can still save a lot of time due to its double heating system that enables rapid water heating for speedy cooking. As steaming usually takes time as the heat needs to penetrate into your food, with this steamer the wait is no longer unbearable. You can get your steamed meals in a jiffy! Be it lamb, chicken, steak, broccolis, or potatoes; this steamer also has sufficient capacity of 2-tier 10L + 10L that allows you to steam just about any of your favourites at once! Call your family and friends and whip up a festive feast!

60 minute timer 
One of this steamer’s significant features is the 60 minute ‘autostop’ timer that includes a bell. This feature will guide you on when the heating has stopped. So you do not have to keep rechecking and wasting your time observing or wondering whether your food is cooked or not. The timer will alert you when the heating has stopped and let you know that your meal is close to cooking to perfection for you, your family, and friends to enjoy.

Exterior water refill funnel 
The steamer also includes an exterior water refill funnel that functions to assist you on adding water without having to disengage any part of the steamer. There is also a water level indicator that tells you how much water is needed for the steaming. So you do not have to play any guessing games when it comes to filling in the water. The indicator shows you directly.

Durable food trays 
No matter how heavy the food is, you do not have to worry about the weight of the food at all. The food trays are durable and strong to withhold the weight. The trays are also non-toxic and is high-heat resistant as it is made of Polycarbonate Plastic. Therefore it is practical and non-contaminating! Instruction:
1. Switch to the lowest temperature level, plug in the power supply and wipe a layer of oil in the pan
2. Switch temperature button to suitable level refer to cooking temperature table
3. Wait signal light ON, it work normally and will automatically adjusting the temperature by itself
4. After usage, switch button to the lowest temperature level before pull out the controller plug
5. Please clean the the grill pan & hot pot after it cooled down to the room temperature. Put it in the package box after dry out, avoid exposing it in direct sun light. Storage it in dry and safe place.

IMPORTANT NOTE:
To prolong life span of the grill pan:
1. Before fring, stewing, simmering, please don't forget to WIPE a layer of OIL on the pan
2. Instead of using hard material shovel to cook on the grill pan, use wood, bamboo, silicone or other soft material spatula.

    Easy way to make delicious , healthful and natural snacks
    Patented converge-flow  drying  system eliminatestray rotation
    Adjustable thermostat
    Thermostat range of 95 -155 degrees F
    Proper temperatureto can protect the nurtrient content
    Diameter of tray 28 cm. Each layer 3.5 cm height.

Preparing dried foods at home is easy with this Food Dehydrator. It allows you to naturally dry a variety of fruits, vegetables and herbs, without added preservatives. Create your own healthy snacks at home - from fruit rolls and muesli bars to dried fruits and meats.

A wide variety of fresh foods can be dried: fruits, vegetables, fish and meats. These foods can be eaten dried for snacks and parties, or reconstituted for cooking and baking. Drying is easier than canning or freezing: you simply wash, slice and load food onto the dehydrator trays. Within hours your foods are dried and ready to eat or store.

As food dries, natural food flavours and sugars tend to concentrate - giving dried foods a sweeter and stronger burst of flavour than fresh foods. Dried foods are nutritous, too! Drying preserves important nutrients that cooking often destroys. And since you don't add sugar or other additives, dried foods make delicious and healthy snacks for your family.

How it works
Dehydrating food is an ancient method of preserving food. It is a gentle, natural process which removes moisture from food. Using a controlled heat temperature, air is circulated from the top of the unit to each of the five trays and base. This method of drying seals in the flavours and nutrients of the food, leaving a high food nutrient and vitamin content.
